channel.title: Blogs on Wen黑白講
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Wen黑白講

item.title: VB classic回應封包設HttpOnly
item.description: iis設定Cookie HttpOnly 在web.config已經增加下面，卻還是沒效 <system.web> <httpCookies httpOnlyCookies="true"/> </system.web> 查到VB classic可以在<system.webServer>增加rewrite module

item.title: peer not authenticated
item.description: javax.net.sslSSLPeerUnverfiedException:peer not authenticated 原本網站配置為jdk6與TLS1.0 改為jdk8與TLS1.2，tomcat則是未升級 網路上查詢jdk6用SSLv2，jdk8用TLSv1
